AzureStorageAccount.ConnectionStringOverride: This connection string will be used instead of RBAC if populated (use for local Azurite connection).

ConnectionStrings.BiblioNexusReadOnlyDb: Read-Only Database connection string using Azure identity. Either get local or grab from dev app service config.

ApplicationInsights.ConnectionString: Application insights connection string. Get from Azure instance.

NotificationHub.Name: Name of the Notification Hub
NotificationHub.ConnectionString: Full access connection string for the Notification Hub
